scenario_text.value: I spotted a monster I’ve never seen before.

Could be a new enemy...
Or maybe it doesn’t give a crap about us.

Yeah...
It didn’t seem all that dangerous, though.

We should look for it, just in case.
Where did you see it?
Over there... You mean the hall?

Okay! You two hide, there’s no telling what
might happen!

Some monster I’ve never seen was over there.
It’s already gone, though.
